title: Make yourself at home! Beautiful Studio in Bloomington
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'show contact info', "If you're looking for a pet-friendly community with a variety of nearby activities, then check out Covington Apartment Homes today.", 'We have several different open floor plans that are sure to fit your lifestyle needs.', 'Contact Weidner Apartment Homes to check availability and learn about our leasing options.', 'Our amazing staff is excited to help you and your family become the newest residents of Bloomington, MN!', 'Bedrooms: Studio |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 536 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1475 - $1505/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Cabana/ Gazebo', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Disposal Chutes', '➢ Elevator', '➢ Free Weights', '➢ Online Payments', '➢ Pond', '➢ Recycling', '➢ Weight Machines', '➢ 24-Hour Fitness Center', '➢ Controlled Access Building', '➢ Fitness Programs/Classes', '➢ Furnished Units Available', '➢ Maintenance on Site', '➢ Massages Offered', '➢ Pet Washing Station', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Video Surveillance/Patrol', '➢ Yoga Classes Offered', 'This Unit Comes With:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Granite Islands In Kitchen', '➢ Kitchen Island', '➢ Maple Cabinetry', '➢ Nature and City Views', '➢ Plank Flooring', '➢ Sliding Glass Doors', '➢ Sprinkler System', '➢ Walk-In Closets', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Lease-Length: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Call for Directions', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A56CC6D3E8D240']
